name: Mater Autem
description:
A game made by a group of first year students that are currently studying Games and Entertainment Technology at a University in Norway.

A relatively simple exploration and puzzle horror game in a low-poly style.

The team consiststs of Nicolay (our team lead), Haavard (our design lead), David (myself, as the lead artist), Heimir, James, and Kate.

We started this project as part of GameLab 2 on January 2021 and completed what we have currently and handed in by the 10th of June 2021.

The theme we were given by our peers was to take inspiration from a game older than the second oldest team member and so we decided to be borrow inspiration from Super Mario 64 for this semester.

We may come back to it at a later date to iron out some minor bugs and do some tweaks to give it that final shiny polish.

Controls:

W, A, S, D to move.

Left shift to run.

Mouse to look around.

Left mouse button to interact with the world and pick up objects.

Right mouse button to drop picked up objects.
